name: 69 Ways to Kill a Zombie
description: Experience the innovative "LOCO" motion VR movement system to grind through hordes of physics-based zombies! Weapons? We give you over 60 tools to unleash Your creativity - guns, explosives, traps, swords, bows, spears! A true first peek into the future of VR movement.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later. Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: NA
